API reference¶

This page provides an auto-generated summary of pyxpcm’s API. For more details and examples, refer to the relevant chapters in the main part of the documentation.

Profile Classification Model¶

Creating a PCM¶

pcm alias of PCM

Attributes¶

pcm.K Return the number of classes
pcm.feature_axis Return the feature axis array

Methods¶

pcm.fit(ds[, feature]) Estimate PCM parameters
pcm.fit_predict(ds[, feature, inplace, ...]) Estimate PCM parameters and predict classes.
